mapper.select: SELECT V.IDX, V.TITLE, V.VOLUNTEER_DATE, V.TIME, V.LOCATION, V.CAPACITY, V.APPLICANTS, V.CONTENT, V.AGE_TARGET, V.CREATED_AT, VT.NAME AS TYPE, VS.NAME AS STATUS, S.SHELTER_NAME AS SHEELTER FROM VOLUNTEERS V JOIN USERS U ON V.USER_IDX = U.IDX JOIN SHELTERS S ON U.IDX = S.USER_IDX JOIN VOLUNTEER_TYPES VT ON V.VOLUNTEER_TYPE_IDX = VT.IDX JOIN VOLUNTEER_STATUS VS ON V.VOLUNTEER_STATUS_IDX = VS.IDX ORDER BY CASE VS.NAME WHEN '모집중' THEN 0 WHEN '모집대기' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, V.IDX DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp}
